item.title: The Free Learner's Dictionary provides limitless translations
item.description: Dictionary.com’s Android app, with over 80 million downloads, now features a free Learner’s Dictionary. This addition provides users with comprehensive tools for professional success, from job searching to business meetings. English, as the dominant language in the business world, is used by approximately 565 million people online. According to a 2012 Harvard Business Review report, a growing number of companies, including major corporations like Airbus and Samsung, have adopted English as their official language.
